headline: M/RAD CORPORATION BUMP SHAKER
description: Bump Shaker    The M/RAD 2424(150)B Bump Tester has been designed to meet the Bump Test requirements of BS 2011, IEC 68-2-27 and IEC 68-2-29. According to BS 2011, Part 2.1Eb: "The machine is intended to reproduce the effects of repetitive shocks likely to be experienced by components and equipment during transportation or when installed in various classes of vehicles."  M/RAD has been acquired by Vibration and Shock Technologies, LLC. (VST, LLC.)
categories.lvl1: Material / Physical Testing Equipment > Vibration and Shock
categories.lvl2: Material / Physical Testing Equipment  >  Vibration and Shock > Electrodynamic Shakers
specstable:
Manufacturer M Rad
Model 2424(150)B
Other Information

Maximum payload: 150 Lbs.
Digital Bump Counter with pre-set:

  • Frequency of bump impluse: 1 - 2 impacts/seconds
  • Impact pulse duration: 6 - 16 ms
  • Impact pulse type: half-sine
  • Maximum velocity change: 60 in/sec
Power Requirements 240 V 30.0 A 60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 30.000 in (76.2 cm)
Depth 42.000 in (106.7 cm)
Height 39.000 in (99.1 cm)
Weight 1,164 lb (528 kg)
